attributes.action: Remove all illegal immigrants from the UK immediately without ref to humanrights
attributes.additional_details:
This is part of an email from a retired RAF officer who served in the sixties-now living in Germany
Europe is now in total chaos. The flood of refugees cum economic
immigrants into Europe has reached ridiculous proportions
Angela Merkel in a speech welcomed all refugees to Germany.The Italian Govnt instructing their Navy to rescue all boat refugees & bring them to Italy. 8000 people per day are now entering-Mostly young males
authorities must be firm and send them back. Perhaps it is too late.
attributes.background: The events in Paris show the folly of not giving top priority to protection of UK citizens. The immediate removal of all people & their families who have no legal reasons to be in the UK would be a reasonable response. All people expressing anti-UK/Westren views should be immediately deported
